show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Think Out Loud, Share It with A Crowd! It’s Open Forum on Leid Stories! <!--more--> Let’s hear your take on world affairs or what’s happening in your world.
It’s Open Forum, where great minds like yours gather to exchange information, opinions and ideas, and create a community of interest.
No “wrong” or “right” way of thinking; all points of view are welcome.
But be prepared to be questioned closely – with love and respect, of course!
